meanings.definition: Express (an idea or feeling) fluently and coherently.
meanings.sent1: She articulates her thoughts clearly during the presentation.
meanings.sent2: He articulates his emotions through his artwork.
meanings.sent3: The robot articulates its gratitude in a mechanical voice.
meanings.sent4: Her dance articulates the joy of freedom.
meanings.sent5: The teacher articulates the importance of kindness to the students.
